overview:
Eric Browne is the vice president of product management for Smartsheet.com. Prior to Smartsheet.com, Eric was at Onyx Software Corporation, where he led the vertical marketing and alliance teams. Eric managed several of the Fortune 1000 accounts, focusing on financial services firms. In addition, he established the original business development team, creating a profitable network of 50 companies including IBM, Microsoft, Accenture and Compaq. Prior to Onyx, he worked in Accenture’s Strategy Consulting Group focusing on Fortune 500 clients.

Source : SmartSheet.com
